notes.note: Technology: C, C++, Fortran, PHP, python event-based plugin framework

Included plugins to open up latest GCC and LLVM for fine-grain program analysis and autotuning, and to open up HPC applications for online tuning and adaptation on heterogeneous architectures [$#cm_29db2248aba45e59_1943b3f46fabaee4#$, $#cm_29db2248aba45e59_3b9c0386749be8ad#$]

title: OpenME event-based plugin framework and unified interface
to: making rigid, hardwired applications and tools interactive, tunable and adaptive
